General.Name: Saranacentral Bajatama Tbk
General.Description: PT Saranacentral Bajatama Tbk engages in manufacturing and trading of steel products in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Galvanized, Saranalume, Colouring, and Non Production. It offers galvanized coated steel, aluminum zinc-coated steel, and painted steel products. The company markets its products under the SARANA brand. Its products are used in various applications, including building and construction; electrical and machinery; motor vehicles; office and equipment; and others, as well as residential, industrial, and commercial roofing and cladding; and curve roofing. PT Saranacentral Bajatama Tbk was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
